abstract: Some Mumbai neighborhoods have been without power for more than 24 hours.
snippet: Some Mumbai neighborhoods have been without power for more than 24 hours.
lead_paragraph: While blackouts are common in most parts of India, South Mumbai residents have, for the most part, been protected from such inconveniences. However, since 4 am on Saturday morning, the lights have been out in the city's financial district, Nariman Point, and parts of South Mumbai.
